mcq.prompt: Which of the following covered in Workplace Safety and Health Act (Design for Safety) Regulations is true?
mcq.optionA: An up-to-date design for safety register that needs to be kept by the architect.
mcq.optionB: It focuses on workplace safety and health systems and cutcomes, rather than merely on compliance.

mcq.optionD: Design plan for WSH should include drawings, design details, specifications, materials and bills of quantities (including specifications of articles or substances) relating to a structure, and calculations prepared for the purpose of a design, excluding building information modelling.

mcq.prompt: Which of the following covered in NParks Handbook is true?
mcq.optionA: Combined length of the allowable structures must not exceed 3.0m or 25% of the length of the green buffer (excludes ingress/egress) or peripheral planting verge along that side, whichever is greater.
mcq.optionB: An arborist report is required when trees are removed.
mcq.optionC: Tree Impact Assessment is an evaluation of the adverse impacts of construction activities on tree health and stability.
mcq.optionD: Green buffers should generally be flat to the ratio of 1:40. If site situation does not permit, the proposed slope should not be steeper than the ratio of 1:2.
mcq.explanation:
https://www.nparks.gov.sg/partner-us/development-plan-submission/guidelines-on-greenery-provision-and-tree-conservation-for-developments 
 Nparks Guidelines on Greenery Provision and Tree Conservation for Developments 
 Tree Impact Assessment.

mcq.prompt: Under the Housing Developers (Show Unit) Rules, which of these rules is false?
mcq.optionA: Names of streets, prominent buildings, facilities and other features within a radius of 1km of the project must be clearly marked and legible.
mcq.optionB: The site plan must be based on the approved building plan(s) with the building plan approval date(s) and number(s) stated clearly.
mcq.optionC: The show unit floor-to-ceiling height must be the same as that shown in the approved plan for the depicted unit.
mcq.optionD: All door frames must be installed in the show unit.

mcq.prompt: The construction of a loft within a condominium unit that is similar to a furniture deck can be exempted from planning permission if it meets the following criteria, except:
mcq.optionA: The total area is not more than 5sqm.
mcq.optionB: It is a lightweight furniture fixture that does not form part of the structural element of the building.
mcq.optionC: There is only one such loft per unit.
mcq.optionD: The headroom of the loft area is higher than the headroom below the loft.
mcq.explanation: Headroom of the loft area is higher than the headroom below the loft.
